prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
### General Principles
- Based on Markdown, easy to read and write.
- Designed to be understood by both humans and machines.
- File extension: `.book`, encoded in UTF-8 without BOM.
- Two variants: flat (simple prompt) and full (structured with tasks, commands, and prompts).
- Compatible with version control systems like git.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Markdown, easy to read, easy to write, humans, machines, file extension, .book, UTF-8, BOM, flat variant, simple prompt, full variant, structured, tasks, commands, prompts, version control, git
